item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Tejas, a passionate and driven graduate student specializing in Computer Science, currently based in Salt Lake City, Utah. I am pursuing my MS degree in Computer Science from the University of Utah. With a strong background in software engineering, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions and optimizing technology to meet business goals. Before getting into Graduate school, I worked as Full-Stack Software Engineer at Airtel Digital, India for 2 years where I worked on multiple platforms ranging from E-commerce, Payments Bank in an Agile environment following latest industry practices like Microservice architecture, Frontend frameworks, Data streaming and DevOps CI/CD pipelining to name a few.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I’d love to hear from you! If you’ve got any interesting jobs or projects or whether you have a question about my work, a collaboration idea, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out. Get in Touch Link to heading Email: tejasrpawar0108@gmail.com LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/tejaspawar007 GitHub: github.com/tejasrpawar Location: Salt Lake City, UT, USA

item.title: Projects
item.description: Browse through my Github for more projects. CALTECH Bird Dataset Classification Using Capsule Network Link to heading Technology: Python3, High Performance Computing Description: Developed an advanced classification system for 200 species of North American birds, each represented by 60 samples, by expanding a preexisting Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to a Capsule Network (CapsNet). Enhanced model accuracy, leveraging CapsNet’s superior ability to recognize spatial hierarchies and relationships within the dataset, significantly improving classification performance with the use of High Performance Computing.

item.title: Resume
item.description: See my one-page resume here Education Link to heading University of Utah Link to heading August 2023 - Present Masters of Science in Computer Science GPA: 3.8/4 Relevant Courses: Advanced Algorithms, Computer Architecture, Machine Learning, Operating Systems Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad Link to heading July 2017 - June 2021 Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology CGPA: 8.18/10 Relevant Courses: Computer Science- Design And Analysis Of Algorithms, Data Structures And Algorithms, Database Management System, Operating System, Object Oriented Methodology, Data Mining, Deep Learning.
